recommendations: Major Account Manager - Government sales at Verizon Wireless

Jeff has a unique ability to connect with his employees and customers that has served him well in his career.  He consistently produced solid results and developed a strong culture in his work groups.  His employees raved about his concern for their professional and personal goals and always gave maximum effort in support of Jeff and the business.  Jeff consistently provided coaching and creative suggestions to his team, peers and manager that added value and improved performance.  He was always open to feedback and receptive to changes in the business.  Jeff was asked to transfer to multiple stores due to his track record of success in dealing with challenging employee situations and always improved the morale and produced results.  I recommend Jeff for any leadership position in or outside the wireless industry.
